title: Battle Regalia Poppy Chroma: Rose Quartz, Obsidian, or Emerald? (Poll)
body:
I currently only have enough BE left for one chroma and I've narrowed between Battle Regalia Poppy's Rose Quartz, Obsidian, or Emerald chroma.
Rose Quartz is cute, Obsidian looks cool, and Emerald just looks real nice.
I don't know which to get.

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3usg7ybC-vU/WAZ8Tt3PfzI/AAAAAAAAWMM/CYQV70nSDVkqyGl66a-5zohfcrsg6nddgCLcB/s1600/Poppy_8.jpg https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BkXlnBfJAc8/WAZ8Tkup-7I/AAAAAAAAWMI/jBpXwTrU-BInnRiORqMJuVhJM0bwYBsewCLcB/s1600/Poppy_13.jpg https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6eHIqPD2j64/WAZ8TcmQKoI/AAAAAAAAWME/1KGhDUXqOl0LhC6lv1LqvQN3x3RaQkSsgCLcB/s1600/Poppy_10.jpg
